item.title: Working as Stream Lead
item.description:
+++ date = “2015-08-15” Description = “Working as Stream Lead.” Keywords = [“Development”, “Lead”] Section = “post” Slug = “Working as Stream Lead” Tags = [“Soft skills”] Title = “Working as Stream Lead” +++

Last month I got a promotion from the company that I work for and now I wear a new hat as Stream Lead. This title could be a little in a Scrum environment,
